item.description:
Join Em, Scott and Ro for a Special Monday Night Meetup at George's in Pascoag!

Where's THAT you say? P-Collective member and home-grown Pascoagian Scott has been raving about the place since we first met him. Incidently its also Scott's last week in RI before he heads back into the wilds of Brooklyn from wence he came. So come out to Pascoag, try something new and wish Scott a fond farewell! Let's check it out!

http://maps.google.co...'s+%2Bpascoag+ri&fb=1&gl=us&hq=george's&hnear=%2Bpascoag+ri&cid=15478628686996550891

http://maps.google.co...'s+%2Bpascoag+ri&fb=1&gl=us&hq=george's&hnear=%2Bpascoag+ri&cid=15478628686996550891

Please RSVP so Emily, Ro and Scott know who's coming!

Hope to see you there!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Emily, Scott and Ro if you go - you can't miss us!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup and Bon Voyage to Scott!
